## Component() function

Component decorator, used to mark a class as a component and register it to IOC container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function Component(identifier?: string, type?: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  identifier | string | _(Optional)_ Optional identifier for the component. If not provided, will use the class name. |
|  type | string | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

ClassDecorator

ClassDecorator function that registers the target class as a component.

## Example


```ts
@Component()
class UserDto {}

@Component('customName')
class OrderClass {}
```
